means: 使某人（某物/自己）缠绕，纠缠于（某物中），使某人（自己）陷入（困难或复杂的环境中）( entangle的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: In the course of time, many of their myths become entangled.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后，他们很多荒诞的说法都变得错综复杂了。

sentence.Network_en: Some objects had got entangled with the underneath mechanism of the engine.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些东西缠在了发动机下面的机件上。

sentence.Network_en: This case was bound to get entangled in international politics.
sentence.Network_cn: 这件事肯定会在国际政坛上纠缠不清。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 有人能稍微解释一下量子缠绕(entangled)效应吗? [ 物理 ] 什麽是量子隧道效应复合材料? [ 物理 ] 为什麽量子隧道效应复合材料其导电.
The ropes were entangled so I was not able to untie the parcel ., ＂ 绳子缠在一起了 , 所以我没能解开包裹 . ＂.
This question is entangled with many others ., 这个问题和许多其他问题纠缠在一起.

list.abs: 高分子的链缠结(chain entanglement)是高分子凝聚态物理中基本问题。缠结如何进行定量化描述是高分子缠结研究中一个重要问题。高分子链只有通过相互穿插的方式形成“.
dramatic conflicts 戏剧冲突dramatic entanglement 戏剧纠纷dramatic expression 戏剧表情戏剧表情
专攻量子缠结（quantum entanglement）的美国国家标准技术研究所（National Institute of Standards and Technology）研究人员Ari …
molecular emission spectrometry 分子发射光谱molecular entanglement 分子缠结molecular equilibrium 分子平�

entry.tran: 被缠住的;纠结在一起的
entry.def: If something is entangled in something such as a rope, wire, or net, it is caught in it very firmly.

example.ex: ...a whale that became entangled in crab nets.

entry.def: If you become entangled in problems or difficulties, you become involved in problems or difficulties from which it is hard to escape.

example.ex: This case was bound to get entangled in international politics.
example.tran: 这件事肯定会在国际政坛上纠缠不清。

means.word_mean: 1. deeply involved especially in something complicated;
2. twisted together in a tangled mass;

auth_sentence.content: Folklore talks of bats becoming entangled in your hair.
auth_sentence.res_content: Folklore talks of bats becoming entangled in your hair.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Folklore talks of bats becoming entangled in your hair.

auth_sentence.content: The entangled quantum particles are like a rubber string.
auth_sentence.res_content: The entangled quantum particles are like a rubber string.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The entangled quantum particles are like a rubber string.

auth_sentence.content: Music and movement are particularly entangled in the brain.
auth_sentence.res_content: Music and movement are particularly entangled in the brain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Music and movement are particularly entangled in the brain.

sentences.en: He became entangled in legal disputes.
Sara had got entangled with some political group.
sentences.cn: 萨拉与某一政治团体有牵连。

sentences.en: Some military observers fear the US could get entangled in another war.
sentences.cn: 一些军事观察家担心美国会卷入另一场战争。

sentences.en: Suddenly she was entangled in the seaweed.
sentences.cn: 突然间她被海草缠住了。

sentences.en: The fishing lines had become hopelessly entangled.
sentences.cn: 鱼线缠在一起，没办法解开。

sentences.en: Who can separate these entangled ropes for me?
sentences.cn: 谁能为我把这些绕在一起的绳子解开?
